data.body: DALLAS, Aug. 28, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- ACME, LLC (NYSE: ACME) (ACME) reported today that storm-related impacts from Hurricane Laura on ACME's assets, finances and operations are not expected to be significant, and, most importantly all employees are safe and accounted for.
subject: NAT
data.title: ACME Provides Business Update on Hurricane Laura Impact
